bug.text: When the port specified via -ORBpoa_iiop_port happens to be in use, an internal omniORB exception is raised by resolve_initial_reference(). Now a system exception CORBA::INITIALIZE is raised instead.

bug.summary: Missing make rules for GCC on Solaris
bug.text: Make rules for the omniDynamic shared library were missing, so the new libCOS failed to link.
The name() function of idltype.Declared accidentally returned a list containing a single string rather than just the string itself.
